basicAuthentication.description: Basic username/password authentication provided via authentication headers. This security scheme is stateless and requires re-authentication on every request
basicAuthentication.name: Basic

tokenAuthentication.description: Authentication provided by an API key.  This security scheme is stateless and requires re-authentication on every request
tokenAuthentication.name: Bearer

loginAuthentication.description: Authentication by providing a username/password in the request body.  This security scheme is stateful and requires support for cookies.
